short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A glowing, animated new tab extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Luminous New Tab is a new tab extension which has a cool animated gradient background. New tabs will show the time, weather, your bookmarks and let you search the web too!
